scripts.repository:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=de.stevenschwenke.aws.stratospheric.cdk.DockerRepositoryApp" -c applicationName=docker-repository-app -c accountId=582070606165 -c region=eu-central-1 --require-approval never
scripts.repository:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=de.stevenschwenke.aws.stratospheric.cdk.DockerRepositoryApp" -c applicationName=docker-repository-app -c accountId=582070606165 -c region=eu-central-1 --force --require-approval never
